sect2.para: Five Things You Didn't Know About Diabetes That Could...

Diabetes is one of the most common non-communicable diseases globally, affecting about 422 million people. When you hear the word 'diabetes,' the first thing that most likely pops into your mind is 'high blood sugar.' While most people.....
Diabetes is one of the most common non-communicable diseases globally, affecting about 422 million people. When you hear...
It's a group of metabolic disorders characterized by chronically elevated blood glucose (hyperglycemia).
There are 3 main types of diabetes

sect1.para: <!--end col--><!--end row--><!--end container--><!--end footer-->Â© document.write(new Date().getFullYear()); Diatron Health.

<!--end row--><!--end container-->    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(){
        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
            if (window.scrollY > 50) {
                document.getElementById('navbar_top').classList.add('fixed-top');
                document.getElementById('navbar_top').classList.add('header-shadow');
                // add padding top to show content behind navbar
                navbar_height = document.querySelector('.navbar').offsetHeight;
                document.body.style.paddingTop = navbar_height + 'px';
            } else {
                document.getElementById('navbar_top').classList.remove('header-shadow');
                document.getElementById('navbar_top').classList.remove('fixed-top');
                // remove padding top from body
                document.body.style.paddingTop = '0';
            }
        });
    });    function hideAnnouncement() {
        document.getElementById('announcement').classList.add('d-none');
    }

    function earlyAccess() {
        window.open('https://mailchi.mp/1c449e56047c/earlyaccess', '_blank');
    }
